amendment.description: Amendments en bloc reduce the Science and Technology research and development account under EPA by $20 million; increase the Environmental Programs and Management account by $13 million; increase the funding for specified Geographic Programs by $50 million and increase the funding for the Great Lakes Restoration Initiative by $50 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment comprised of several amendments offered en bloc: reduce the Science and Technology account by $20 million and increase the Environmental Programs and Management account by $13 million, increase the funding for the Geographic Programs by $50 million and increase the funding for the Great Lakes Initiative by $50 million.

action.text: Amendments en bloc (A031) offered by Mr. LaTourette.
On agreeing to the LaTourette amendments (A031) Agreed to by recorded vote: 220 - 206 (Roll no. 660).
